title: Goofy's freeway troubles (K)
creator_credit: Walt Disney Productions, Ken Peterson and Les Clark
brief_description: In this amusing driver education animation, Goofy demonstrates some common freeway problems that can be avoided by following a simple checklist which includes the car, the driver, the freeway and basic common sense.
creator_credit_for_label: Walt Disney Productions, Ken Peterson and Les Clark
description: In this amusing driver education animation, Goofy demonstrates some common freeway problems that can be avoided by following a simple checklist which includes the car, the driver, the freeway and basic common sense.
